sentences.sentence: One of the 2016 Oscar snubs is the movie Ex Machina.
sentences.translation: 2016年的奥斯卡遗珠之一是「人造意识」这部电影。

sentences.sentence: As if some Deus ex machina had wrought these changes overnight.
sentences.translation: 就好像某神灵下凡，一夜之间带来了这些变化。

sentences.sentence: Ex Machina at least treats the subject as complicated-something that needs to be tested.
sentences.translation: 《机械姬》起码还知道事情是复杂的，需要进一步测试。
